description: This file defines a Sidebar component for a web application's front-end. It provides the structure, rendering logic, and interactive behaviors for a navigational sidebar, including expandable groups, route highlighting, and accessibility features. It uses imported utilities for DOM manipulation and storage, and interacts with a router and internationalization (i18n) modules to dynamically update its state based on route changes and language settings.

methods.name: getExpandedMap()
methods.description: Reads the map of expanded/collapsed groups from storage.

methods.name: setExpandedMap(map)
methods.description: Saves the map of expanded/collapsed groups to storage.

methods.name: isPathActive(itemPath, routePath)
methods.description: Determines whether a given navigation item's path matches the current route, indicating it is active.

methods.name: buildGroupLink({ id, label, path, children }, expanded, routePath)
methods.description: Constructs DOM elements for a collapsible group link with its children.

methods.name: buildLink({ label, path }, routePath)
methods.description: Constructs a DOM element for a single navigation link.

methods.name: renderSidebar(container, i18n, route)
methods.description: Renders the entire sidebar navigation structure based on the NAV_STRUCTURE, current route, and i18n translations.

methods.name: attachBehaviors(container, router)
methods.description: Attaches event handlers for toggle interactions, keyboard navigation, and route/language change reactions to update the sidebar UI.

methods.name: initSidebar(rootEl, router, i18n)
methods.description: Public API function to initialize the sidebar component within a specified root element, wiring up route and language change listeners for dynamic updates.

ctags.name: buildGroupLink
ctags.pattern: /^function buildGroupLink({ id, label, path, children }, expanded, routePath) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ id, label, path, children }, expanded, routePath)
